reviews.review_msg: Lecture were interesting and you learned something. However, he comes across either as very lazy or disorganized because we had about 15 assignments and didnt get one single grade back. Overall Id prefer profs who are more organized.

He is so knowledgeable; the exams fair; you LEARN from his assignments ; his lectures are clear and interesting.  He is passionate about Stats and always has excellent examples that clearly demonstrates his point.   He has an open door office hour. If you ever need/want to take Stat, take it with Carl! I can't say enough good things about him.
